configureIndicatorExtraction.START_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Optimize your incident response and threat management with the Indicator Extraction Configuration widget in FortiSOAR. This tool lets you customize indicator extraction by excluding specific indicators, reducing false positives and improving overall efficiency. Key features include indicator exclusion, search any indicator from excluded list, add new custom indicator type, setup exclude indicators using bulk import and setup indicator type mapping.
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: This page allows you to define specific indicators that should be excluded from the extraction process
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_BULK_IMPORT_USE_: or Click to Use Standard Uploader
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_BULK_IMPORT_FILE: File Content is Null or Invalid
configureIndicatorExtraction.IOC_TYPE_MAPPING_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Specify the fields from alerts and map them with the appropriate indicator types
configureIndicatorExtraction.IOC_TYPE_MAPPING_PAGE_FIELD_LOADING_ERRO: Failed to load fields. Please try again later.
configureIndicatorExtraction.IOC_TYPE_MAPPING_PAGE_ENABLE_CREATE_FILE: If checked then a file indicator will be created for email attachments in 'Suspicious Mail/Phishing' alerts during the indicator extraction process.
configureIndicatorExtraction.IOC_TYPE_MAPPING_PAGE_ENABLE_ADD_COMMENT: Enable Add Comment for Excluded Files
If checked then a comment will be added to the alert if any file is excluded during the indicator extraction process.
